name: Capture Escape - W.I.P
description:
This is a game I have been working on for three years, this version SUCKS, and I'm planning to make a newer alteration, it also exists on Scratch, but I reccomend this, as it is faster, has glitches patched and other crap, sorry if this game sucks.

Songs that I have used:

STRESSED OUT(Instrumental)

[Deltarune Remix]
SharaX - Revolvania

Storyswap Color [Undertale AU] - Virtues Vengeance The Saviors Finale NITRO Remix

[Drumstep] - Nitro Fun - Dragonfly
(Ayde & Dextre Remix)
